Package org.zaproxy.zap.network

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HttpRedirectionValidator
    A validator of redirections, called for each redirection of a HTTP request.
    HttpSenderListener
    A listener that will be notified when a new request is ready to be forwarded to the server and when a new response is ready to be forwarded to the client.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultHttpRedirectionValidator
    Default implementation of HttpRedirectionValidator, all redirections are considered valid and notifications of new messages are simply ignored.
    DomainMatcher
    Class that contains rules to match domains.
    HttpRequestBody  
    HttpRequestConfig
    A configuration of a HTTP request.
    HttpRequestConfig.Builder
    Builder of HttpRequestConfig.
    HttpResponseBody  
    ZapCookieSpec
    A CookieSpecBase that does not do any path validation.
    ZapDeleteMethod
    An HTTP DELETE method implementation that ignores malformed HTTP response header lines.
    ZapHeadMethod
    An HTTP HEAD method implementation that ignores malformed HTTP response header lines.
    ZapHttpParser
    A utility class to parse HTTP response headers.
    ZapNTLMScheme
    NTLM is a proprietary authentication scheme developed by Microsoft and optimized for Windows platforms.
    ZapOptionsMethod
    An HTTP OPTIONS method implementation that ignores malformed HTTP response header lines.
    ZapPostMethod
    An HTTP POST method implementation that ignores malformed HTTP response header lines.
    ZapPutMethod
    An HTTP PUT method implementation that ignores malformed HTTP response header lines.
    ZapTraceMethod
    An HTTP TRACE method implementation that ignores malformed HTTP response header lines.
